Address.label: Address
Address.value: 13355 NOEL ROAD,9TH FLOOR, DALLAS, Texas, 75240, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: AECOM is one of the largest global providers of design, engineering, construction, and management services. The firm serves a broad spectrum of end markets including infrastructure, water, transportation, and energy. Based in Los Angeles, Aecom has a presence in over 150 countries and employs 51,000. The company generated $13.3 billion in sales and $701 million in adjusted operating income in fiscal 2021.
